name: minimact-electron-filemanager
description: Desktop file manager built with Minimact and Electron

scripts.publish:dotnet: cd src && dotnet publish -c Release -r win-x64 --self-contained
scripts.build: npm run publish:dotnet && cd electron && npm run build
scripts.build:win: npm run publish:dotnet && cd electron && npm run build:win
scripts.build:mac: npm run publish:dotnet && cd electron && npm run build:mac
scripts.build:linux: npm run publish:dotnet && cd electron && npm run build:linux

author: Minimact Contributors
